metadata.synopsis: Players react upon seeing the corpse of an ogre killed by a warlock.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: Burned from the inside out. Whose work is this, I wonder?
0.context: NodeContext: impressed and a little repulsed by the magic that did this

1.speaker: Player
1.text: Burned from the inside out. Must've been our warlock friend.
1.context: NodeContext: impressed by the magic that did this - recognises it as the work of a warlock known to us
